W) all fires burn with a yellow flame

PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is NOT true of pH: 
 
W) the terms basic or alkaline describe a solution with pH greater than 7 
X) the highest value on the pH scale is 14 
Y) strong acids dissociate almost completely in water 
Z) a pH meter operates by measuring small differences in the density of different fluids
tossupA:
Z) A PH METER OPERATES BY MEASURING SMALL DIFFERENCES IN THE 
DENSITY OF DIFFERENT FLUIDS
bonusQ:

W) a 10-fold increase in the hydrogen ion concentration 
X) a 10-fold decrease in the hydrogen ion concentration 
Y) a 100-fold increase in the hydrogen ion concentration 
Z) a 100-fold decrease in the hydrogen ion concentration
bonusA: W) A 10-FOLD INCREASE IN THE HYDROGEN ION CONCENTRATION
